projects.title: MathInfo.org
projects.description: A website dedicated to articles about math and computer science, with the goal to spread knowledge about their many concepts.

projects.title: Impart
projects.description: A framework for generating websites entirely with C#.

projects.title: PMath
projects.description: A library intended to extend the math functionality of C#.

projects.title: P3D
projects.description: A very barebones 3D game engine written in C with GLUT.

projects.title: Glimpse Engine
projects.description: A simple 2D game engine written in C with SDL2.

projects.title: BWGames
projects.description: An (originally black and white) collection of command line games written in C#.

projects.title: SpeebUp
projects.description: A BepInEx mod that aims to make speedrunning Peeb's Adventures easier, written in C#.

projects.title: HammerUtils
projects.description: Utility for creating new projects with the old Hammer engine, designed specifically with CS1.6 maps in mind.

projects.title: WOCChess
projects.description: Chess program (and maybe eventual AI) created with goal of having contributors from the World of Coding discord server (discord.gg/woc).

projects.title: StringHelp
projects.description: A website designed to assist string arithmetic by displaying each character's index.

projects.title: CLICarry
projects.description: A library built to massively simplify CLI command handling in C#.

projects.title: LightCSV
projects.description: A very lightweight library intended to quickly parse CSV documents in C#.

projects.title: Zwarp
projects.description: A command line password manager which stores and encrypts passwords for any of your services, made with C#.

projects.title: Scrape
projects.description: An abandoned language which was heavily based on C#.

projects.title: Weather
projects.description: A website that tells you the weather based on location. Only works for locations inside America; I might add more features in the future.

projects.title: PSud
projects.description: A program that solves Sudoku puzzles with human strategies enabling move-by-move analysis. Written in C#.

projects.title: Notepad
projects.description: A website that mimics the very basic features of Windows notepad.

projects.title: DUtilities
projects.description: A library that adds utilities to D#+, of course written in C#.

projects.title: PixelatedUtilities
projects.description: A library with miscellaneous utilities made in C#.
